alert.note: Alert for Berks; Lehigh (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 1:01PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Berks and west central Lehigh Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lenhartsville, or 16 miles southeast of Tamaqua, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kutztown, Hamburg, Lenhartsville, New Tripoli, Claussville and Wanamakers. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 32 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
